duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide transaction support for real estate and debt market deals, focusing on tax structuring, corporate planning, compliance, and tax risk management.
Assist with fundraising, private fund formation, debt sheet review, agreement negotiation, and identification of tax risks.
Evaluate technical tax matters, ensure compliance with tax regulations, and prepare documentation for proposed/executed transactions.
Stay updated with changing tax laws and evolving structures, and manage external law firms and accounting firms providing advice on transactions.
Support the compliance team by reviewing returns and estimated tax calculations.
Lead partnership tax planning matters, tax research and planning related to Qualified Opportunity Zone credits, and manage complex deal-related transactions.

education_certification.credential: Tax Lawyer with 5-8 years tax experience at a law firm. Bachelor's degree in Law (Master's preferred).
